heading: Samsung Galaxy M35 5G Review: Worthy upgrade to Galaxy M34
content: Samsung launched the Galaxy M35 5G smartphone last month as the successor to the Galaxy M34 5G. This retains the camera and the battery from the predecessor, but it gets a faster Exynos 1380 5nm SoC, a new AMOLED screen and is price competitively. Is this a good upgrade compared to the Galaxy M34 5G? Let us dive into the review to find out. Continue reading “Samsung Galaxy M35 5G Review: Worthy upgrade to Galaxy M34”

heading: Bharti to acquire 24.5% of BT Group’s shares for estimated $4 billion
content: Bharti Global, the international investment division of Bharti Enterprises, has announced it will acquire approximately a 24.5% stake in British Telecom (BT) Group from Altice UK. Continue reading “Bharti to acquire 24.5% of BT Group’s shares for estimated $4 billion”

heading: TCL Freedom to Win Big campaign: Check out offers, cashback, contest and more
content: TCL has launched its “Freedom to Win Big” campaign, running from August 1 to August 31, 2024. Continue reading “TCL Freedom to Win Big campaign: Check out offers, cashback, contest and more”

heading: U&i Durable series wireless neckband and Push series wired earphones launched
content: U&i has expanded its Wired & Wireless Neckband line-up in India with the introduction of the Durable Series Wireless Neckband and Push Series Stereo Earphones, following last month’s release of the Energy and Plus series. Continue reading “U&i Durable series wireless neckband and Push series wired earphones launched”

heading: realme 13 series teased ahead of India launch
content: realme has started teasing the launch of realme 13 series in India, after the launch of realme 13 Pro series in the country last month. The company says ‘Speed has a new number’ highlighting the performance of the phone. Continue reading “realme 13 series teased ahead of India launch”

heading: Philips 3000 Series Dual Basket Airfryer with Rapid air technology launched in India
content: Philips Domestic Appliances has expanded its Air Fryer line-up with the introduction of the Philips Dual Basket Air Fryer – 3000 Series. This new air fryer features two baskets of different sizes, designed for cooking larger meals or two different dishes at once. Continue reading “Philips 3000 Series Dual Basket Airfryer with Rapid air technology launched in India”

heading: realme to unveil 320W SuperSonic charge on August 14
content: After teasers, realme has confirmed the launch of its 320W SuperSonic Charge as the world’s Fastest Charging Technology at the annual 828 Fan Festival on August 14, 2024 at the realme headquarters in Shenzhen, China. Continue reading “realme to unveil 320W SuperSonic charge on August 14”

heading: OPPO F27 Pro+ 5G update to bring GenAI features; F27 5G to launch in India soon
content: OPPO has announced that the latest F27 Pro+ 5G smartphone which was launched in June as the first rugged phone to feature IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings, Military Grade Durability with MIL-STD-810H ratings and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 protection will get Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) features in an OS update on August 22nd. Continue reading “OPPO F27 Pro+ 5G update to bring GenAI features; F27 5G to launch in India soon”

heading: Sennheiser HD 620S closed-back headphones launched in India
content: Sennheiser has just introduced the HD 620S, the latest model in its renowned HD 600 series in India, designed for audiophiles seeking high-quality closed-back headphones for private, reference listening. Continue reading “Sennheiser HD 620S closed-back headphones launched in India”

heading: boAt crosses over 5 Crore ‘Made in India’ units milestone
content: boAt today announced that it has crossed the 5-crore mark in ‘Made in India’ products. This comes a year after the company reported 2.5 crore ‘Made in India’ units. Continue reading “boAt crosses over 5 Crore ‘Made in India’ units milestone”

heading: realme C63 5G with 6.67″ 120Hz display, Dimensity 6300 launched in India starting at Rs. 9999
content: realme just launched the realme C63 5G, the company’s latest C series 5G smartphone in India, after the launch of C65 5G earlier this year. It packs a 6.67″ HD+ 120Hz display, is powered by the latest MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC with up to 8GB of RAM and up to 8GB of virtual RAM. Continue reading “realme C63 5G with 6.67″ 120Hz display, Dimensity 6300 launched in India starting at Rs. 9999”

heading: iPhone 16 could precede major innovations in 2025
content: Apple’s iPhone 16 is expected to maintain steady sales until more innovative models are launched next year, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. Continue reading “iPhone 16 could precede major innovations in 2025”

heading: NU Republic breaks the mold with analog Motorhead GT3 amid smartwatch boom
content: Nu Republic is an Indian wear-tech brand known for its product portfolios, such as true wireless earbuds, speakers, and smartwatches. It launched the Motorhead GT3, a non-smartwatch inspired by the world of high-speed racing. Continue reading “NU Republic breaks the mold with analog Motorhead GT3 amid smartwatch boom”

heading: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE promo materials reveal detailed specs
content:
Samsung Galaxy S23 FE has been in the rumors for quite some time. Now the promo materials have surfaced revealing almost all the specifications of the phone.
Continue reading “Samsung Galaxy S24 FE promo materials reveal detailed specs”

heading: BSNL unveils 4G and 5G-ready OTA and USIM Platform
content: BSNL, India’s state-owned telecom operator, has introduced a new Over-the-Air (OTA) and Universal SIM (USIM) platform, developed in collaboration with Pyro Holdings, to enhance its telecom services nationwide. Continue reading “BSNL unveils 4G and 5G-ready OTA and USIM Platform”
